overview: Casting Crowns, who took the Christian music world by storm with their 2003 self-titled debut album, toured the country in 2005-2006 to support Lifesong, their much-anticipated sophomore release. This 70-Minute DVD captures all the energy and emotion of the Lifesong Tour.  Gospel Music Channel recorded this performance in stunning high-definition just outside Atlanta in November of 2005 and world premiered this concert on television in April of 2006.  Lifesong, Praise You In This Storm, Love Them Like Jesus, Here I Go Again, and What If His People Prayed are among the powerful and spirited songs the band brings to life. It was a nigh concert goers will never froget. Now, with this DVD, you are front row, center for this unforgettable event.
title: Casting Crowns - LifeSong
